attributes.action: National inquiry of rape gangs & holding those accountable who covered it up !!
attributes.additional_details: help promised & followed through for all survivors !!! No ethnicity should be held in higher regard than any other … all foreign predators to be deported permanently!!!!
attributes.background: Any agency involved in the cover up be investigated and legally held accountable for the actions.. it’s the worst disgrace to hit this country and has been ignored for years!! No child should be put through this nor should their family’s they are human beings not to belet down horrendously for votes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
